name: Eva
description: Evanglic Dream, or EV dolls in short, is the latest realistic spherical doll developed by Volgin, a toy company in Lighthalzen. Hope you like it!

name: Eva ATF Voucher
description: Evanglic Dream, or EV dolls in short, is the latest realistic spherical doll developed by Volgin, a toy company in Lighthalzen. Hope you like it!

name: EVA Joint Event Premium
description: Adventurers from land of Rune Midgard, let's pilot EVA and fight with Shito!

name: Event Food Chest
description: An advancing T2 Practicing Pack given by Adventure Association (can used by advanced T2 players and above). Open the pack to receive JOB EXP Potion (L) x5, BASE EXP Potion (L) x5, Valkyrie's Gift x2, Belief Token x30, Gold Medal x3, Eden Coin x500.

name: Evil Beret
description: In the land or Rune Midgard, this hat is really popular among the high school students, but teachers are not very happy about that.

name: Evil Black Hat
description: The hat worn by a dubious human organization at secret assemblies.

name: Evil Bracer
effect: Flee ＋5,When casting a single target skill, the next physical attack skill has a chance to deal 100% extra damage

name: Evil Bracer [1]
effect: Flee ＋5,When casting a single target skill, the next physical attack skill has a chance to deal 100% extra damage

name: Evil Chest
description: The Mimic contains stuff collected from dead adventurers. Her favorite is said to be the [Broken Blade].

name: Evil Eye
description: "You peep at the abyss-like darkness, and the darkness is peeping you from the abyss."

name: Evil Eye Blueprint
description: "You peep at the abyss-like darkness, and the darkness is peeping you from the abyss."

name: Evil Goblin Mask
description: The mask worn by the goblin gives people a sense of malevolence.
